sentences.sContent: She woke him anxiously shaking at his sunburnt shoulders.
sentences.sContent_eng: She woke him anxiously shaking at his sunburnt shoulders.
sentences.sCn: 她焦急地摇着他被太阳晒黑的肩膀，唤醒了他。

sentences.sContent: Ground zero is The Thatch, the village pub joined, via its beer garden, to the even rowdier Billy Budds, rammed to the rafters with sunburnt revellers living the dream.
sentences.sContent_eng: Ground zero is The Thatch, the village pub joined, via its beer garden, to the even rowdier Billy Budds, rammed to the rafters with sunburnt revellers living the dream.
sentences.sCn: Thatch酒吧，这家乡村酒馆通过自己的啤酒花园，加入到了吵闹的比利巴德的行列，晒得黝黑、活在梦中的狂欢者的喧哗声充满着整个酒吧。

sentences.sContent: The whole bus is quiet as this paradise passes in front of our sunburnt faces.
sentences.sContent_eng: The whole bus is quiet as this paradise passes in front of our sunburnt faces.
sentences.sCn: 天堂般的美景在我们被太阳晒黑的面孔前掠过时，巴士上静极了。

synos.tran: 晒黑的；有晒斑的；日炙的

words.tran: 晒伤皮肤；晒红皮肤；晒黑皮肤

remMethod.val: sun(太阳)+burnt(烧伤的)→被太阳灼伤的→晒黑的， 晒伤的
